titleStmt.title: A true copy of a letter sent by S.J. an eminent minister of the Church of England, to Sir Tho. Armestrong, prisoner in Newgate, on the 18th of this instant June, 1684
titleStmt.author: S. J., Minister of the Church of England.

notesStmt.note: This item is incorrectly identified on reel 900:40 as Wing T2620.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
